name: The Museum Without Walls
description: This game was a project for the first ever Merveilles Hyperjam, created over a three day period within an emulated Macintosh Plus environment. While the sequencing is fairly basic, it was great fun to make work using Hypercard and watch what other people created. It simulates what a surreal digital museum might look like, taking cues from my own work as well as that of others such as Dumbtype (JP) in an interactive environment.
